# URL

TIP

URL 类Rurl 目前暂时收录了 9 个 实际项目开发中 url 常用的方法

# Rurl 项目介绍

Rurl 类为 HandDay 的子类，属于 url 相关的工具类，致力于各种 url 数据的快速处理

# Rarr 项目结构

url
  |----- lib
  |----- index.js

# Rurl 项目 API

方法名 说明
getCurUrl 获取当前 url
formatUrl 格式化 url
getQuery 获取 url 的查询参数
urlSerialize url 参数序列化
wxAuthUrlFmt 微信企业返回的授权 url 专属的格式化方法
urlTmtFmt 请求 url 地址中带模板的格式化
urlParamDelByKey 删除 url 上指定的参数 返回删除后的 url
urlParamAdd url 添加参数
isUrl 验证 url 的合法性

# Rurl 项目示例

# 1.getCurUrl

见字释义

getCurUrl() //

# 2.formatUrl

内部采用 new URL(url)

formatUrl('https://www.baidu.com')
//URL {origin: "https://www.baidu.com", protocol: "https:", username: "", password: "", host: "www.baidu.com", …}

# 3.getQuery

不传参数默认获取当前 url 上的查询参数

getQuery()
getQuery('www.baidu.com') //{}
getQuery('www.baidu.com?name="李四"') // {name:'李四'}

# 4.urlSerialize

baseURL(www.baidu.com) + param({name:'帆老板',age:18}) = > www.baidu.com?name=帆老板&age=18

urlSerialize('www.baidu.com', { name: '帆老板', age: 18 }) // www.baidu.com?name=帆老板&age=18

# 5.wxAuthUrlFmt

本方法是企业微信返回的授权 url 地址格式化方法，该方法自动去重同样的键值，state的值为corpId=122206 时会自动干掉这个键值，值为其它则不清除

var jest = [
    'http://cloud.midays.com/wbproject/qy/?code=1jQZD736R5_H_tjMduCW5JaN5pH9Eu14&state=corpId=122206#/?corpId=122206',
    'http://cloud.midays.com/wbproject/qy/?code=1jQZD736R5_H_tjMduCW5JaN5pH9Eu14&state=11#/?corpId=122206',
    'http://cloud.midays.com/wbproject/qy/?code=1jQZD736R5_H_tjMduCW5JaN5pH9Eu14&state=11#/about?corpId=122206',
    'https://test.microanswer.cn/?code=weg123ku23frth2355csx&state=corpId=122206#/usercenter',
    'https://test.microanswer.cn/?code=weg123ku23frth2355csx&state=STATE#/usercenter',
    'https://www.microanswer.cn/?from=singlemessage#/home',
    'https://www.microanswer.cn/?code=asfe354few1ca3df&state=STATE#/home',
    'https://www.microanswer.cn/?code=asfe354few1ca3df&state=STATE#/hom',
    'https://www.microanswer.cn/?state=STATE#/home',
    'https://www.microanswer.cn/?state=STATE&from=singlemessage#/home',
    'http://cloud.midays.com/wbproject/qy/?code=1jQZD736R5_H_tjMduCW5JaN5pH9Eu14P1I2mD8BVrU&state=corpid=122206#/?corpId=122206&fromid=1',
    'http://cloud.midays.com/wbproject/qy/?code=1jQZD736R5_H_tjMduCW5JaN5pH9Eu14P1I2mD8BVrU&state=corpid=122206#/home',
    'http://cloud.midays.com/wbproject/qy/?code=1jQZD736R5_H_tjMduCW5JaN5pH9Eu14P1I2mD8BVrU&state=corpid=122206#/detail?fromtype=0&fromid=1',
    'http://cloud.midays.com/wbproject/qy/?code=1jQZD736R5_H_tjMduCW5JaN5pH9Eu14&state=corpId=122206#/?corpid=122206',
    'https://www.microanswer.cn/?code=asfe354few1ca3df&state=corpid=12206&good=istue#/home'
]
jest.forEach(i => console.log(wxAuthUrlFmt(i)))
/*
http://cloud.midays.com/wbproject/qy/#/?code=1jQZD736R5_H_tjMduCW5JaN5pH9Eu14&corpId=122206
http://cloud.midays.com/wbproject/qy/#/?code=1jQZD736R5_H_tjMduCW5JaN5pH9Eu14&state=11&corpId=122206
http://cloud.midays.com/wbproject/qy/#/about?code=1jQZD736R5_H_tjMduCW5JaN5pH9Eu14&state=11&corpId=122206
https://test.microanswer.cn/#/usercenter?code=weg123ku23frth2355csx
https://test.microanswer.cn/#/usercenter?code=weg123ku23frth2355csx&state=STATE
https://www.microanswer.cn/#/home?from=singlemessage
https://www.microanswer.cn/#/home?code=asfe354few1ca3df&state=STATE
https://www.microanswer.cn/#/hom?code=asfe354few1ca3df&state=STATE
https://www.microanswer.cn/#/home?state=STATE
https://www.microanswer.cn/#/home?state=STATE&from=singlemessage
http://cloud.midays.com/wbproject/qy/#/?code=1jQZD736R5_H_tjMduCW5JaN5pH9Eu14P1I2mD8BVrU&corpId=122206&fromid=1
http://cloud.midays.com/wbproject/qy/#/home?code=1jQZD736R5_H_tjMduCW5JaN5pH9Eu14P1I2mD8BVrU
http://cloud.midays.com/wbproject/qy/#/detail?code=1jQZD736R5_H_tjMduCW5JaN5pH9Eu14P1I2mD8BVrU&fromtype=0&fromid=1
http://cloud.midays.com/wbproject/qy/#/?code=1jQZD736R5_H_tjMduCW5JaN5pH9Eu14&corpid=122206
https://www.microanswer.cn/#/home?code=asfe354few1ca3df&good=istue
*/

# 6.urlTmtFmt

请求 url 地址中带模板的格式化, 有时候，后端会给前端一个请求接口模板，例如 /uap/msg/announcementRecord/{sysId}/{tenantId}/{userId}，需要是再给你一个参数对象，{sysId:111,tenantId:222,userId:333},然后返回/uap/msg/announcementRecord/111/222/333，当然对象如有多余的参数则序列化成为查询参数。

urlTmtFmt('/api/getUerInfo/{userId}/{roleId}', { userId: 12, roleId: 33 }) //api/getUerInfo/12/33
urlTmtFmt('/api/getUerInfo/{userId}/{roleId}', { userId: 12, roleId: 33, depId: 234 }) //api/getUerInfo/12/33?depId=234

# 7.urlParamDelByKey

删除 url 上查询参数上指定的 key

urlParamDelByKey('name', 'www.baidu.com?name=fan&age=18') //www.baidu.com?age=18

# 8.urlParamAdd

给 url 或指定 url 添加查询参数

urlParamAdd({ aaa: 1 }, 'www.baidu.com') // www.baidu.com?aaa=1

# 9.isUrl

校验 url

isUrl() // 校验当前页面的url
isUrl('http://cloud.midays.com') //true
isUrl('cloud.midays.com') //false

# Rurl 项目更新
